mapper.insert: insert into club(cno, mno, carrive, ctheme, ctitle, ccontent, csdt, cedt, ctotal) values (#{no}, #{writer.no}, #{arrive}, #{theme}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{total})
mapper.select:
select c.cno, c.carrive, c.ctitle, c.ccontent, c.ctheme, c.csdt, c.cedt, c.ctotal, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name from club c inner join member m on m.mno=c.cno
where c.carrive like concat('%', #{value},'%') or c.csdt like concat('%', #{value},'%') or c.cedt like concat('%', #{value},'%') or c.ctheme like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by c.cno desc
select c.cno, c.carrive, c.ctitle, c.ccontent, c.ctheme, c.csdt, c.cedt, c.ctotal, m.mno as writer_no, m.mname as writer_name from club c inner join member m on m.mno=c.cno where c.cno = #{value}
